## normalCW variable

Computes 2D normal by rotating direction vector `a` -<!-- -->&gt; `b`<!-- -->, 90 deg clockwise, normalized to length `n` (default: 1). If `out` is null, creates new vector.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
normalCW: (out: Vec, a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, n?: number) => Vec
```
